title: Unable to purchase RP with IDEAL
body: I'm unable to buy RP with IDEAL because the button to finish the payment remains grey and unclickable. Is there a way to resolve this issue because I'd very much like to buy RP and I assume Riot likes to make additional profit.

replies.body: You may want to reboot your computer in case it just needed a quick break. Please try the transaction again and if you're still having issues, let me know.
